participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and resilient with a love for nature and animals.
participant_1.background: I am a house wife who loves my cat Cow. I have many favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is the time I went swimming in the lake with my family. I used to be in the marines. I love animals. I was born completely deaf.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Creative and family-oriented with a passion for writing and baking.
participant_2.background: My friends would be so impressed by my cupcake recipe. My father was a dry wall finisher. I enjoy cold winters and strong breezes. I'm so grateful to have a family that supports my creative career. I'm going to be spending time with my family and friends, and relaxing.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for work?
I am a creative writer. I have a family that supports me and I love it.
I am a stay at home mom who loves animals. I used to be in the marines.
Wow, what was your favorite part of being in the marines?
I loved the camaraderie and the feeling of accomplishment.
That sounds amazing! I am not a fan of cold weather at all.
I actually love cold weather! I am planning on spending my winter swimming in the lake.
That is awesome! I could never do that. I would be too cold.
I used to be completely deaf, so now I am just grateful for all of my senses.
I am so glad that you were able to overcome that! That is amazing.
Thank you. I am just grateful for my family and friends.
I am grateful for my family and friends too. They are so supportive.
I am going to go swim in the lake now. It is supposed to be a beautiful day.
Enjoy your swim! I am going to go bake some cupcakes
